thread.title: BRIEF-Coty Reports Q3 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.13

title: BRIEF-Coty Reports Q3 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.13
text:
May 9, 2018 / 10:36 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Coty Reports Q3 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.13 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Coty Inc: * . REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE DILUTED - REPORTED $0.10
* QTRLY NET REVENUES OF $2,222.7 MILLION INCREASED 9.4% AS REPORTED * Q3 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.12, REVENUE VIEW $2.17 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* “CONSUMER BEAUTY DIVISION CONTINUED ITS UNEVEN PERFORMANCE, BUT WITH ENCOURAGING SIGNS OF STABILITY”
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.12, REVENUE VIEW $2.17 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* CONTINUE TO AIM TO DELIVER MODEST ORGANIC NET REVENUE GROWTH FOR SECOND HALF OF YEAR
* ANNOUNCED A DIVIDEND OF $0.125 PER SHARE, PAYABLE JUNE 14, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
